name: Web of Lies
description:
You've been wronged. 

You've been lied to.

 Do you want revenge? 

... Then become the Liar, and delve deeper and deeper into lies. 

Lie your way to the bottom - without running out of options

The main goal is to choose the correct web of lies (a correct path through the nodes) that leads you to the main ending - while understanding the story of the protagonist through its lies.

Built for Ludum Dare 48 - Deeper and deeper

Instructions - 

Click anywhere on the intro screen to start.

Click on the nodes to select dialogue options.

Press Escape to restart the game

Important -

The web version of the game should be played in fullscreen!
